products.name: Poland Spring Water
products.facts: ["Poland Spring Water is sourced from multiple springs in the state of Maine.","The 500 ml bottles are made from 100% recycled plastic (rPET).","Poland Spring is committed to sustainable water sourcing and environmental stewardship.","The water undergoes rigorous quality testing to ensure it meets or exceeds FDA standards for bottled water."]

products.name: Energy Bar (Chocolate Chip)
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Bars, Dietary supplements, Bodybuilding supplements, Energy bars
products.facts: ["Made with whole food ingredients including oats and chocolate chips.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","Rich in energy-boosting nutrients, making it a convenient snack for active lifestyles."]

products.name: Acai-Blueberry-Pomegranate
products.categories: Beverages, Waters, Energy drinks, Sweetened beverages
products.packaging: Plastic,Bottle,PET - Polyethylene terephthalate,Transparent PET,Opaque PET,Recyclable plastic
products.facts: ["Contains organic acai berry, blueberry, and pomegranate juice.","Packaged in a recyclable 20 fl oz bottle to reduce environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and colors, ensuring high quality and purity.","Sourced from sustainable farms, supporting eco-friendly agricultural practices."]

products.name: Frosted Flakes
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals
products.facts: ["Frosted Flakes are made primarily from corn, sugar, and malt flavoring.","The packaging for Frosted Flakes is recyclable, promoting better waste management practices.","Frosted Flakes are fortified with vitamins and minerals, enhancing their nutritional quality.","The product contains no artificial colors or flavors, aligning with consumer preferences for natural ingredients."]

products.name: Orangina - Cool Can
products.brands: Orangina, Orangina Schweppes France, Schweppes International Limited
products.packaging: Métal, Plastique, Boîte de conserve ou canette, Canette, Film
products.facts: ["Orangina is packaged in recyclable aluminum cans, which are lightweight and reduce transportation emissions.","The cans are made from 70% recycled materials, promoting circular economy practices.","Orangina's production process emphasizes the use of natural ingredients, ensuring a quality beverage with no artificial preservatives.","The brand is committed to sustainability, actively engaging in initiatives to reduce water usage and carbon footprint during production."]

products.name: Yaourts brassés nature
products.labels: Lait Français, Nutriscore, Nutriscore B, Triman
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality, natural ingredients without artificial additives.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Contains live probiotics that promote gut health and well-being.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to ensure quality and ecological responsibility."]

["0.5l bottles are often made from recycled PET plastic, reducing the need for new raw materials.","These bottles are lightweight, which helps to lower transportation emissions and energy use.","0.5l containers can be easily recycled, promoting a circular economy and reducing landfill waste.","High-quality 0.5l bottles are designed to preserve the freshness of beverages while being BPA-free and safe for consumers."]

products.name: Galleta integral
products.labels: Source of fibre,Ponto Verde,Rico em fibras,es:Con aceite de girasol alto oleico
products.facts: ["Galleta integral is made from whole grain ingredients, providing higher fiber content compared to regular biscuits.","The packaging is designed to be eco-friendly, minimizing plastic use and promoting recyclability.","Galleta integral contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring a more natural product.","The production process emphasizes sustainability, sourcing ingredients from responsible suppliers."]

products.name: Soft White Rolls Sliced
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality wheat flour for a soft texture.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Baked fresh daily to ensure optimal quality and taste."]

products.brands: Gut & Günstig, Gut & Günstig, Gut & Günstig, Gut & Günstig
products.facts: ["72g is made from sustainable materials that minimize environmental impact.","The production process of 72g adheres to eco-friendly practices, reducing carbon footprint.","72g products are designed for durability, ensuring long-lasting quality and reducing waste.","The materials used in 72g are recyclable, promoting a circular economy."]
